suite.name: Amazon Testes

test.name: Caso de Teste 04 - Remover Produto do Carrinho

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Acessar a home page do site Amazon.com.br
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Digitar o nome de produto "Xbox Series S" no campo de pesquisa
kw.source_name: Digitar o nome de produto "${TEXT_BUSCA}" no campo de pesquisa

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Xbox Series S' into text field '//input[@id="twotabsearchtextbox"]'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Adicionar o produto "Console Xbox Series S" no carrinho
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Keyword 'Element Text Should Be' found both from a custom library 'SeleniumLibrary' and a standard library 'XML'. The custom keyword is used. To select explicitly, and to get rid of this warning, use either 'SeleniumLibrary.Element Text Should Be' or 'XML.Element Text Should Be'.
Verifying element '(//div/h2/a/span)[1]' contains exact text 'Console Xbox Series S'.
The text of element '(//div/h2/a/span)[1]' should have been 'Console Xbox Series S' but it was 'Racing Wheel Overdrive Designed for Xbox Series X|S By HORI - Officially Licensed by Microsoft'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.status: The text of element '(//div/h2/a/span)[1]' should have been 'Console Xbox Series S' but it was 'Racing Wheel Overdrive Designed for Xbox Series X|S By HORI - Officially Licensed by Microsoft'.

kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Remover o produto "Console Xbox Series S" do carrinho
Verificar se o carrinho fica vazio
